overview: Ever wonder what money will buy at an exclusive Secret Spa? When the rich and beautiful look to fulfill their fantasies, they head to the Malibu Sunrise Resort! Where discretion is guaranteed and the staff is devoted to your pleasure. Do you desire an interracial romp, a threesome, some lesbian love or some playful S and M? Whatever you crave, Secret Spa is the perfect place to get the release your body needs... and where facials are always on the house!
title: Secret Spa
